description: Don’t let a few looming clouds keep you off the trails. With the Lone Peak ALL-WTHR Low 2, you can set out for a hike no matter the forecast. Water-resistant, lightweight bootie construction protects you from the elements, with the same legendary comfort you know and love from the Lone Peak Family. Roomy Original FootShape™ Fit, responsive Altra EGO™ midsole foam, and a grippy MaxTrac™ outsole keep you moving all day. Bag that adventure, even if there are a few raindrops!
name: Altra Lone Peak AW Low 2 - Mens
